line_1: Ne'er shalt thou blush to honour; to assert
You fancy first, and then assert.
line_2: Caught by your own delusive Art,

line_1: The Monks Lord Albert's will assert —
line_2: When did they know a breaking heart

line_1: Whilst YOU the Right of Liberty assert,
line_2: And all the Ills of broken Faith avert;

line_1: When they shall boldly soon thy right assert.
line_2: But here, in peace, O! Warrior, end the night!

line_1: Shall bid my soul herself assert;
line_2: What sacred power, what healing art,
Once more to Fancy we'll revert;
